Articles.Content:
Hm... yes time to say Hi to All.

The funniest Singleplayerthing ive ever discovered, FSX, Orbiter and luck were bringing me here.

Happy Landings , with or without Mods ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif).

Welcome to the forums Mikki!

Happy landings to you too!

As they say on Kerbin, "Yna gnidnal uoy nac klaw yawa morf..."

Welcome!

> 
> As they say on Kerbin, "Yna gnidnal uoy nac klaw yawa morf..."
> Welcome!

No, it's backwards Spanish. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Hey, Mikki! Welcome aboard!

As they say on Kerbin, "Reiuqlauc ejzirreta es edeup ranimac sojel ed..."

Welcome!

Better, Starwhip? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> "Yna gnidnal uoy nac klaw yawa morf..."

That's actually backwards English in the order of the letters but not the placement of the words for, "Any landing you can walk away from..."

Also, hi person!

EDIT: 

> 
> No, it's backwards Spanish.

 This is a thing, and

> 
> As they say on Kerbin, "Reiuqlauc ejzirreta es edeup ranimac sojel ed..."
> Welcome!
> 
> Better, Starwhip? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

 Ninja'd.
![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-16T20:32:34Z" title="05/16/2015 08:32  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 16, 2015</time> by RAINCRAFTER**

Welcome Mikki. Remember to keep your hands and feet inside the command module during all launches. Snacks will be served once we reach a stable orbit. If you have any questions, ask. Somebody will know the answer. 

Fly straight and true.

> 
> Welcome Mikki. Remember to keep your hands and feet inside the command module during all launches. [...]

/doh! That's what I've been doing wrong.

Thank you all for your heartly welcome,

Some of you have realised im not english native and i hope you can forgive me the simple tell...

The only question i have will go to SQUAD, but i realy dont expect an answer...

"Could i have a scramjet in stockgame? Maybe for muuuuuuch Sience and/or muuuuuuuuch Reputation/Funds???"

Until then i try keeping my Limbs out of the airstream.![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

And now I need a breakfastsnack...

> 
> [...]
> Until then i try keeping my Limbs out of the airstream.![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
> 
> [...]

Now you've got me thinking 'Kerbals in wingsuits' ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Oooh! Hang gliders! Worked in .90 with infiniglide, but now?

Mikki, try checking out the International Subforums.
